main event: A glowing circular light was observed traveling at high speeds over the water in Bayshore, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a diameter comparable to a playing card., The light emitted a bright glow., The observer called the police regarding the sighting., Coast Guard aircraft were reported to be flying towards the area of the UFO sighting., Several other people had also reported seeing the UFO to the Islip Tower.
witness description: Observer was driving along Route 27 when the sighting occurred.
